Village Without Women is a comedy about what Cinequest associate director Mike Rabehl describes as a story of country bumpkins from a village of Serbian bachelors trying to find these women in Albania, a country that they're not on good terms with. Jenna Fischer , Chris O'Donnell and John Turturro 's cousin Aida Turturro star in the comedy A Little Help.
